name: (GMTK 2020) Total System Faliure
description:
Created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2020. (Theme: "Out of Control")

Fight off an onslaught of enemies, and try to keep things under control as your ship's systems get disabled and overloaded.

Keyboard
W - Thrust
A/D - Turn
S - Stabilise
Space/Mouse1 - Shoot

Controller
D-Pad - Thrust/Turn/Stabilise
A - Shoot
B - Stabilise

Fonts
 - "Kenny Rocket Square" - Kenny Game Assets
 - "m3x6" - Daniel Linssen

Audio
 - Again (BGM) - LunaLucid Music
 - 200 Free SFX - Davit Masia

All other assets were created during the jam. As you can probably tell
